entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow mixed with drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 11 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
